description: This feature includes Banking Activation of Subscribers
name: BankingActivation

elements.name: To verify that System Admin is able to activate mobile banking if CIF number exist.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Banking Channel Activation and click
Enter the CIF number and search for the user
Confirm and Verify the Mob Banking Activtion Message sent to user

elements.name: To verify that System Admin is able to verify admin is able to see the Activated Message.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Banking Channel Activation and click
Enter the mobile or CIF number which is not registered and search for the user
verify admin is able to see the Message mobile or CIF number does not exist in the system

elements.name: To verify that System Admin is able to activate mobile banking using MSISDN if CIF number does not exist.

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to Banking Channel Activation and click
Enter the Full KYC mobile number and search for the user
Click on next and activate mobile Banking
Confirm and Verify the Mob Banking Activtion Message sent to user
